```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```
```{r}
hr <- read_csv("data/HRDataset_v13.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()
```
```{r}
# ensuring that column names are consistent
hr <- hr %>% 
  rename(c("date_of_hire" = "dateof_hire", "date_of_termination" = "dateof_termination", "days_late_last_30" = "days_late_last30"))
```
